description:
Shin-chan!  I wanna buy Chiba a porno mag present to cheer him up! Huh?  Why?  Because he said the panty shots in manga just don`t do it for him anymore…But I`m not old enough to buy one yet…Oh, good thinking!  I should just draw him one myself! You be my editor Shin-chan!  Well?  Is it sexy?  Are you excited?  Y-You`re not?  Shin-chan, you`re not excited by my nude forms?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: At the Height of Your Perversion
変態ざかりの君たちへ
